description.value:
A large tiger-eye jewel serves as this item's pendant. The jewel sometimes moves like an actual eye, and it helps you discharge eye-related effects.

Neck Slot: Uncommon

Enhancement Bonus: Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

Property:

You gain an item bonus to saving throws equal to the enhancement bonus against effects imposed by attacks that have the gaze keyword, that originate in the attacker's eye or eyes (DM discretion), or that affect your eyes or sight.

Power âœ¦ Daily (Free Action)

You make a saving throw to end an effect against which this item grants a bonus to saving throws even if a save cannot normally end the effect. If you save, the effect ends.
